summary: In June 1944, twelve Japanese seaman are stranded on an abandoned-and-forgotten island called An-ta-han for seven years.
cast: Akemi Negishi|Tadashi Suganuma|Kisaburo Sawamura|Shôji Nakayama|Jun Fujikawa|Hiroshi Kondô|Shozo Miyashita|Tsuruemon Bando|Kikuji Onoe|Rokuriro Kineya|Daijiro Tamura|Chizuru Kitagawa|Takeshi Suzuki|Shirô Amakusa|Josef von Sternberg
title: Anatahan
